column3: My apologies, <hex:02080FE905FF06>madam<hex:FF04>sir<hex:03>, but I am only permitted to conduct business with a select list of clientele registered with the Boutique of Splendors.

Welcome, my <hex:020818E905FF0A>dear lady<hex:FF09>good sir<hex:03>. Here at the Resplendent Tool Exchange, we offer the finest selection of tools available for the ever-discerning artisan. How may I be of service?
In order to obtain a resplendent tool, you must first use crafters' scrips to purchase resplendent material A from the material exchange.
Using 8th-level master recipes, this material can then be used to craft resplendent component A, which can be exchanged with Limbeth for a higher-grade material, resplendent material B.

The process is then repeated, crafting resplendent component B to exchange for resplendent material C. This material is then crafted into resplendent component C, which can be traded for the final resplendent material.
After acquiring a sufficient number of the final resplendent materials, they can be traded for a resplendent tool.
